Text: A Short Noteam considering options for leaving Scient and thought Id drop you a quick note Enronis one of very few organizations in the world which I admire and think will thrive in the long term Id like to play a role in that success and think my background has many of the qualities which could prove useful Ive attached my resume and would greatly enjoy starting a dialogue Regards Bradley Bradley Gooddoc
